languages.text: "Разумеется. Я разыскал вас для того, чтобы пригласить на встречу с Леди Теодорой. Полагаю, у вас много вопросов к своей покровительнице. Уверен, у нее к вам — не меньше. Перелет выдался непростой, жаль, что вам так и не выдалось возможности поговорить раньше".

traits.locale_text: "Разумеется. Я разыскал вас для того, чтобы пригласить на встречу с Леди Теодорой. Полагаю, у вас много вопросов к своей покровительнице. Уверен, у нее к вам — не меньше. Перелет выдался непростой, жаль, что вам так и не выдалось возможности поговорить раньше".

languages.text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."
languages.original_text: "Разумеется. Я разыскал вас для того, чтобы пригласить на встречу с Леди Теодорой. Полагаю, у вас много вопросов к своей покровительнице. Уверен, у нее к вам — не меньше. Перелет выдался непростой, жаль, что вам так и не выдалось возможности поговорить раньше".

traits.locale_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous flight thus far."

"But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous flight thus far."

"But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

"But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

"But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

languages.text: “当然了，我打算邀请您与西奥多拉夫人会面。我猜，您有很多问题打算问夫人，而我相信，她也同样有很多问题要问您。但令人遗憾的是，你们一直都没能找到机会谈谈。这场航行迄今为止充满了艰辛。”
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

traits.locale_text: “当然了，我打算邀请您与西奥多拉夫人会面。我猜，您有很多问题打算问夫人，而我相信，她也同样有很多问题要问您。但令人遗憾的是，你们一直都没能找到机会谈谈。这场航行迄今为止充满了艰辛。”

languages.text: «Por supuesto. He venido a invitarl{mf|e|a} a una reunión con lady Theodora. Imagino que tendrá muchas preguntas para su nueva patrona, y sé que ella también tendrá más de una para usted. Lamento que aún no hayan tenido ocasión de conversar; este ha demostrado ser un viaje espinoso».
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. He venido a invitarl{mf|e|a} a una reunión con lady Theodora. Imagino que tendrá muchas preguntas para su nueva patrona, y sé que ella también tendrá más de una para usted. Lamento que aún no hayan tenido ocasión de conversar; este ha demostrado ser un viaje espinoso».

languages.text: 「もちろんです。あなたをシオドーラ様との会合に招待しに来たのです。後援者であるあなたは、ご主人様にたくさんの質問があることでしょう。そしてシオドーラ様も同じように、あなたに質問があると思います。あなたが今まで話をする機会がなかったのは残念なことです。これまでの旅は大変でしたに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、もちろんあなたをレディ・テオドラとの会合に招待しに来たのです。あなたはあなたのご主人様にたくさんの質問があることでしょう。そしてレディ・テオドラも同じように、あなたに質問があると思います。あなが今まで話をする機会がなかったのは残念なことです。これまでの航海は大変でしたから」
「もちろんです。あなたをシオドーラ様との会合に招待しに来たのです。後援者であるあなたは、ご主人様にたくさんの質問があることでしょう。そしてシオドーラ様も同じように、あなたに質問があると思います。あなたが今まで話をする機会がなかったのは残念なことです。これまでの旅は大変でしたに違いありません」

languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

languages.text: « Mais certainement. Je suis venu vous inviter à un entretien avec dame Théodora. J'imagine que vous avez de nombreuses questions à poser à votre bienfaitrice et je suis sûr qu'elle en a tout autant pour vous. Il est regrettable que vous n'ayez pas encore eu l'occasion de la rencontrer, mais ce voyage n'a pas été de tout repos jusqu'ici. »
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

traits.locale_text: « Mais certainement. Je suis venu vous inviter à un entretien avec dame Théodora. J'imagine que vous avez de nombreuses questions à poser à votre bienfaitrice et je suis sûr qu'elle en a tout autant pour vous. Il est regrettable que vous n'ayez pas encore eu l'occasion de la rencontrer, mais ce voyage n'a pas été de tout repos jusqu'ici. »

languages.text: "Aber natürlich. Ich bin hier, um Euch zu einem Treffen mit Lady Theodora einzuladen. Ihr habt sicher viele Fragen an Eure Gönnerin. Und sie hat bestimmt ebenso viele Fragen an Euch. Leider hattet Ihr bislang keine Gelegenheit für ein Gespräch – es war eine beschwerliche Reise."
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich. Ich bin hier, um Euch zu einem Treffen mit Lady Theodora einzuladen. Ihr habt sicher viele Fragen an Eure Gönnerin. Und sie hat bestimmt ebenso viele Fragen an Euch. Leider hattet Ihr bislang keine Gelegenheit für ein Gespräch – es war eine beschwerliche Reise."

languages.text: "Elbette. Sizi Leydi Theodora'yla görüşmeye davet etmek için gelmiştim. Amirinize yönelteceğiniz bolca sorunuz olduğunu sanıyorum. Eminim ki onun da size çok sayıda suali olacaktır. Şimdiye dek konuşma fırsatı bulamamanıza üzüldüm lakin meşakkatli bir yolculuk oldu maalesef."
languages.original_text: "But of course. I have come to invite you to a meeting with Lady Theodora. I imagine you have many questions for your patroness. And I'm sure she has just as many questions for you. It is regrettable that you haven't yet had an opportunity to speak — it has been an arduous voyage thus far."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. Sizi Leydi Theodora'yla görüşmeye davet etmek için gelmiştim. Amirinize yönelteceğiniz bolca sorunuz olduğunu sanıyorum. Eminim ki onun da size çok sayıda suali olacaktır. Şimdiye dek konuşma fırsatı bulamamanıza üzüldüm lakin meşakkatli bir yolculuk oldu maalesef."
